Title: Login Test
Description: Verify login functionality works as expected
StepExpected1: Login page is displayed with username and password fields
StepExpected3: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard

Title: Logout Test
StepExpected1: User is logged in and on the dashboard
StepAction2: Click the logout button in the user menu
StepExpected2: User is logged out and redirected to the login page
